item.title: Seminar talk at Edinburgh Design Informatics
item.dc:creator: Alex Taylor
item.description:
Really delighted to have presented at Design informatics this week. “The grid/table partitions, breaks down bodies & labour. The grid/tables remake the body as an integral part to new infrastructure. The grid/table acts as a regulatory or disciplinary structure, dictating the possible” @alxndrt shakes the core of @DataCapitalEd @DesignInf pic.twitter.com/73tqu2ovLf — chrisspeed (@chrisspeed) September 26, [...]

Read More... from Seminar talk at Edinburgh Design Informatics
item.content:encoded:
Really delighted to have presented at Design informatics this week.

“The grid/table partitions, breaks down bodies & labour. The grid/tables remake the body as an integral part to new infrastructure. The grid/table acts as a regulatory or disciplinary structure, dictating the possible” @alxndrt shakes the core of @DataCapitalEd @DesignInf pic.twitter.com/73tqu2ovLf

— chrisspeed (@chrisspeed) September 26, 2019
